title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 317.11 - Blanket fidelity bond
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 317.11 - Blanket fidelity bond

State Regulations

Every group self-insurer shall be required to file with the
chair evidence that it has obtained a Blanket Fidelity Bond providing coverage
for theft, disappearance or destruction of money, securities, or other
property, in an amount acceptable to the chair. Such bond shall provide
coverage for dishonest acts of the group administrator, or a trustee, employee
or agent of the group, whether identified or not, while acting alone or in
collusion with others, and shall name the group self-insurer as loss payee. Such bond shall be maintained at all times during the existence of the group
self-insurer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
317.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
